node.title: Trail Blazers Fire Team President After Workplace Conduct Inquiry
node.alt: The Portland Trail Blazers fired Neil Olshey, their president of basketball operations, after a review of workplace complaints at the team’s practice facility.
node.description: Neil Olshey, who had been with Portland since 2012, was fired after a review of the workplace environment at the team’s practice facility.
node.content: ["The Portland Trail Blazers fired Neil Olshey, the head of basketball operations, on Friday, citing \u201can independent review of concerns and complaints around our workplace environment at the practice facility.\u201d", "The Blazers did not provide further details about the investigation in the statement announcing the firing \u201cout of respect for those who candidly participated.\u201d", "Olshey was hired as general manager of the Blazers in 2012 and promoted to president of basketball operations in 2015.", "This is a breaking story and will be updated."]
